Package org.jfree.chart.title

Class CompositeTitle

java.lang.Object
org.jfree.chart.block.AbstractContentBlock
org.jfree.chart.title.Title
org.jfree.chart.title.CompositeTitle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Block, ContentBlock, org.jfree.ui.Drawable
public class CompositeTitle extends Title implements Cloneable, Serializable
A title that contains multiple titles within a BlockContainer.
See Also:

    • arrangeNN

      protected ArrangeResult arrangeNN(Graphics2D g2, ArrangeParams params)
      Calculates the size of the title content (excludes margin, border and padding) if there is no constraint. This is either the natural size of the text, or the block size if this has been specified manually.
      Specified by:
      arrangeNN in class Title
      Parameters:
      g2 - the graphics device.
      params - the layout parameters (null not permitted).
